Got both games to work on windows 7 64-bit. Some problems with Icewind Dale 1, disconnected from internet and turned of virusprotection (McAfee is whack) during install and the game is working fine so far. Icewind Dale 2, no problems on win 7 at all.

The no-cd patch gave me an error, so I didn't bother with that one. And expansions works fine.

So it works on windows 7. And once again, great torrent :)

I have been attempting to run Icewind dale and HOW mounted on the virtual clone iso with all patches installed in order, however i am always asked for the disk to be placed in drive E  (laptop cd drive) even though the images are mounted in drive F...its driving me crazy how do I get around this?? X_x
Uninstall everything clean up all icewind dale even registry now mount the original image with your f: drive or virtual drive reinstall do your updates and keep the image mounted.  It should work.
